Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

51  void KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin::SetIntegrator( KSTrajExactSpinIntegrator* anIntegrator )
52  {
53  if( fIntegrator == NULL )
54  {
55  fIntegrator = anIntegrator;
56  fIntegrator->ClearState();
57  return;
58  }
59  trajmsg( eError ) << "cannot set integrator in <" << this->GetName() << "> with <" << anIntegrator << ">" << eom;
60  return;
61  }
62  void KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin::ClearIntegrator( KSTrajExactSpinIntegrator* anIntegrator )
63  {
64  if( fIntegrator == anIntegrator )
65  {
66  fIntegrator = NULL;
67  return;
68  }
69  trajmsg( eError ) << "cannot clear integrator in <" << this->GetName() << "> with <" << anIntegrator << ">" << eom;
70  return;
71  }

132  void KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin::Reset()
133  {
134  if(fIntegrator != NULL){ fIntegrator->ClearState(); }
135  fInitialParticle = 0.0;
136  fFinalParticle = 0.0;
137  };
138 
139  void KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin::CalculateTrajectory( const KSParticle& anInitialParticle, KSParticle& aFinalParticle, KThreeVector& aCenter, double& aRadius, double& aTimeStep )
140  {
141 
142  //std::cout << anInitialParticle.GetSpin() << "\n";
143 
144  static const double sMinimalStep = numeric_limits< double >::min(); // smallest positive value
145 
146  fInitialParticle = fFinalParticle;
147  fInitialParticle.PullFrom( anInitialParticle );
148  double currentTime = fInitialParticle.GetTime();
149 
150  trajmsg_debug( "ExactSpin trajectory integrating:" << eom );
151 
152  bool tFlag = true;
153  double tStep;
154  double tSmallestStep = numeric_limits< double >::max();
155  unsigned int iterCount = 0;
156 
157  while( true )
158  {
159  for( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fControls.End(); tIndex++ )
160  {
161  fControls.ElementAt( tIndex )->Calculate( fInitialParticle, tStep );
162  if( tStep < tSmallestStep )
163  {
164  tSmallestStep = tStep;
165  }
166  }
167 
168  trajmsg_debug( " time step: <" << tSmallestStep << ">" << eom );
169 
170  if(!tFlag){fIntegrator->ClearState();};
171  fIntegrator->Integrate( currentTime, *this, fInitialParticle, tSmallestStep, fFinalParticle, fError );
172 
173  if(fAbortSignal)
174  {
175  trajmsg( eWarning ) << "trajectory <" << GetName() << "> encountered an abort signal " << eom;
176  aFinalParticle = anInitialParticle;
177  aFinalParticle.SetActive( false );
178  aFinalParticle.SetLabel( "trajectory_abort" );
179  fIntegrator->ClearState();
180  break;
181  }
182 
183  tFlag = true;
184  for( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fControls.End(); tIndex++ )
185  {
186  fControls.ElementAt( tIndex )->Check( fInitialParticle, fFinalParticle, fError, tFlag );
187  if( tFlag == false )
188  {
189  double tCurrentStep = tSmallestStep;
190  fControls.ElementAt( tIndex )->Calculate( fInitialParticle, tSmallestStep );
191  if ( fabs( tCurrentStep - tSmallestStep ) < sMinimalStep )
192  {
193  trajmsg( eWarning ) << "trajectory <" << GetName() << "> could not decide on a valid stepsize" << eom;
194  aFinalParticle = anInitialParticle;
195  aFinalParticle.SetActive( false );
196  aFinalParticle.SetLabel( "trajectory_fail" );
197  fIntegrator->ClearState();
198  tFlag = true;
199  }
200  break;
201  }
202  }
203 
204  if( tFlag == true )
205  {
206  break;
207  }
208 
209  if(iterCount > fMaxAttempts)
210  {
211  trajmsg( eWarning ) << "trajectory <" << GetName() << "> could not perform a sucessful integration step after <"<<fMaxAttempts<<"> attempts " << eom;
212  aFinalParticle = anInitialParticle;
213  aFinalParticle.SetActive( false );
214  aFinalParticle.SetLabel( "trajectory_fail" );
215  fIntegrator->ClearState();
216  tFlag = true;
217  break;
218  }
219 
220  iterCount++;
221  }
222 
223  fFinalParticle.PushTo( aFinalParticle );
224  aFinalParticle.SetLabel( GetName() );
225  aFinalParticle.NormalizeSpin();
226 
227  if(fInterpolator != NULL)
228  {
229  fInterpolator->GetPiecewiseLinearApproximation(fPiecewiseTolerance,
230  fNMaxSegments,
231  fInitialParticle.GetTime(),
232  fFinalParticle.GetTime(),
233  *fIntegrator,
234  *this,
235  fInitialParticle,
236  fFinalParticle,
237  &fIntermediateParticleStates);
238 
239  unsigned int n_points = fIntermediateParticleStates.size();
240  fBallSupport.Clear();
241  //add first and last points before all others
242  KThreeVector position = fIntermediateParticleStates[0].GetPosition();
243  fBallSupport.AddPoint( KGPoint<3>(position) );
244  position = fIntermediateParticleStates[n_points-1].GetPosition();
245  fBallSupport.AddPoint( KGPoint<3>(position) );
246 
247  for(unsigned int i=1; i<n_points-1; i++)
248  {
249  position = fIntermediateParticleStates[i].GetPosition();
250  fBallSupport.AddPoint( KGPoint<3>(position) );
251  }
252 
253  KGBall<3> boundingBall = fBallSupport.GetMinimalBoundingBall();
254  aCenter = KThreeVector( boundingBall[0], boundingBall[1], boundingBall[2]);
255  aRadius = boundingBall.GetRadius();
256  aTimeStep = tSmallestStep;
257  }
258  else
259  {
260  fIntermediateParticleStates.clear();
261  fIntermediateParticleStates.push_back(fInitialParticle);
262  fIntermediateParticleStates.push_back(fFinalParticle);
263  KThreeVector tInitialFinalLine = fFinalParticle.GetPosition() - fInitialParticle.GetPosition();
264  aCenter = fInitialParticle.GetPosition() + .5 * tInitialFinalLine;
265  aRadius = .5 * tInitialFinalLine.Magnitude();
266  aTimeStep = tSmallestStep;
267  }
268 
269  //std::cout << "HERE" << "\n";
270 
271  //std::cout << aFinalParticle.GetSpin() << "\n";
272  aFinalParticle.NormalizeSpin();
273  //std::cout << aFinalParticle.GetSpin() << "\n";
274 
275  return;
276  }
277 
278  void KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin::ExecuteTrajectory( const double& aTimeStep, KSParticle& anIntermediateParticle ) const
279  {
280  double currentTime = anIntermediateParticle.GetTime();
281  if( fInterpolator != NULL )
282  {
283  fInterpolator->Interpolate(currentTime, *fIntegrator, *this, fInitialParticle, fFinalParticle, aTimeStep, fIntermediateParticle );
284  fIntermediateParticle.PushTo( anIntermediateParticle );
285  return;
286  }
287  else
288  {
289  fIntegrator->Integrate(currentTime, *this, fInitialParticle, aTimeStep, fIntermediateParticle, fError );
290  fIntermediateParticle.PushTo( anIntermediateParticle );
291  return;
292  }
293  }
294 
295  void KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin::GetPiecewiseLinearApproximation(const KSParticle& anInitialParticle, const KSParticle& /*aFinalParticle*/, std::vector< KSParticle >* intermediateParticleStates) const
296  {
297  intermediateParticleStates->clear();
298  for(unsigned int i=0; i<fIntermediateParticleStates.size(); i++)
299  {
300  KSParticle particle(anInitialParticle);
301  fIntermediateParticleStates[i].PushTo(particle);
302  intermediateParticleStates->push_back(particle);
303  }
304  }
305 
306  void KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin::Differentiate(double aTime, const KSTrajExactSpinParticle& aValue, KSTrajExactSpinDerivative& aDerivative ) const
307  {
308  KThreeVector tVelocity = aValue.GetVelocity();
309 
310  aDerivative = 0.;
311  aDerivative.AddToTime( 1. );
312  aDerivative.AddToSpeed( tVelocity.Magnitude() );
313 
314  for( int Index = 0; Index < fTerms.End(); Index++ )
315  {
316  fTerms.ElementAt( Index )->Differentiate(aTime, aValue, aDerivative );
317  }
318 
319  return;
320  }

323  KSDictionary< KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin >::AddCommand( &KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin::SetIntegrator, &KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin::ClearIntegrator, "set_integrator", "clear_integrator" ) +
324  KSDictionary< KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin >::AddCommand( &KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin::SetInterpolator, &KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin::ClearInterpolator, "set_interpolator", "clear_interpolator" ) +
325  KSDictionary< KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin >::AddCommand( &KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin::AddTerm, &KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin::RemoveTerm, "add_term", "remove_term" ) +
326  KSDictionary< KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin >::AddCommand( &KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin::AddControl, &KSTrajTrajectoryExactSpin::RemoveControl, "add_control", "remove_control" );
327
